A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Where I found The Force Awakens to be mediocre\, The Last Jedi was exciting and fun to watch. The characters are better fleshed out\, with complexity and conflict. Release any expectations you may have for this movie\, and it may be more enjoyable than you think. This movie is unexpectedly even better upon a second viewing\, where certain events that didn't initially make sense are clearer after another watch. There's a lot to unpack in this movie\, and I found it highly enjoyable.
